translation.en: Okay, baby, it's about to get busier.
Go, go, go, go, go, go, go!
Stop the car.
-What? -What?
-Stop! -[Laura yells]
Okay, back, back. Go, go, go! Reverse!
Go, go, go, go!
They're leaving.
They're not leaving. They're regrouping.
translation.de: Nicht weg. Sie formieren sich nur neu.

translation.en: -We have to get off this road fast. -[young Adam] What road?
[Adam] I… I don't understand. How did you find us?
translation.de: Also, wie hast du uns gefunden?

translation.en: [Laura] You don't think I'd be watching your back, even in the past?
translation.de: Denkst du, ich würde in der Vergangenheit nicht auf dich aufpassen?

translation.en: [Adam] Why did you make the jump back in the first place?
I was analyzing data when I found something strange in the jump logs.
translation.de: Mir war etwas Seltsames in den Protokollen aufgefallen.

translation.en: A time jet returning from 2018.
How's that strange?
Because no one ever flew to 2018.
translation.de: Weil niemand je ins Jahr 2018 geflogen ist.

translation.en: [Adam] I don't get it. How did it come back if it never left?
translation.de: Wie kann der Jet dann zurückgekommen sein?

translation.en: Unless someone went back and altered the time stream,
translation.de: Wenn jemand den Zeitstrom verändert hat

translation.en: so the future the jet had left from had already been changed.
translation.de: und die Zukunft, aus der der Jet kam, bereits verändert wurde.

translation.en: God, it's like I traded my brains for those muscles.
translation.de: Gott, habe ich mein Hirn gegen Muskeln eingetauscht?

translation.en: It's a shit deal.
-Cute kid. -Precious, isn't he?
Don't you just wanna hold him underwater till the bubbles stop?
translation.de: Will man ihn nicht einfach ertränken?

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Oh, I freakin' hate myself.
How did this happen?
[Laura] That jet that went back? It was Sorian's.
She went back to November 2018 for a reason.
translation.de: Sie war nicht ohne Grund im November 2018.

translation.en: What happened in November 2018?
I'll tell ya. [sighs]
This happened.
Your father's magnetic particle accelerator,
The Adam Project, had just gone online.
That was the first step toward practical time travel.
translation.de: Der erste Schritt zur praktischen Zeitreise.

translation.en: Sorian must've come back to 2018 and given her younger self some kind of future intel.
translation.de: Sorian muss ihrem jüngeren Ich in 2018 irgendetwas gesteckt haben.

translation.en: What for?
My guess is enough future stock tips to amass her fortune
translation.de: Vermutlich Aktientipps, um ihr Vermögen zu vergrößern

translation.en: and get rid of whatever political obstacles
were keeping her from gaining control of the time program.
translation.de: um die Kontrolle über das Programm zu erlangen.

translation.en: She already had that.
But did she?
No.
No, she didn't.
No.
So this world, our world, everything has already been changed by Sorian.
translation.de: Also wurde in dieser Welt, unserer Welt, bereits alles von Sorian verändert.

translation.en: And your fixed time, 2050, is it bad there?
translation.de: Ist es in eurer Fixzeit in 2050 übel?

translation.en: -We've seen Terminator, right? -Obviously.
That's 2050 on a good day.
translation.de: Das ist 2050 an einem guten Tag.

translation.en: Sorian must've spotted me and planted an altitude bomb on my jet.
translation.de: Sorian muss eine Höhenbombe auf meinen Jet platziert haben.

translation.en: Here, eat something.
-I managed to eject, but it didn't matter. -[mouths] Without my jet, I was a permanent castaway.
translation.de: Ich konnte zwar rausspringen, aber ohne meinen Jet saß ich hier fest.

translation.en: So I had to follow protocol, you know, live out my life here,
translation.de: Also musste ich das Protokoll befolgen. Du weißt schon, hier leben,

translation.en: avoid contact, minimize my footprint,
and hope you were crazy enough to come look for me.
translation.de: und darauf hoffen, dass du nach mir suchst.

translation.en: Alone. All this time.
Four years.
That's the job, right?
-Yeah, but, baby-- -It's…
It's fine. I got used to being alone.
translation.de: Ist schon gut. Ich habe mich daran gewöhnt.

translation.en: Not anymore.
-[sighs] -[Adam] Hey.
I found you.
-[Laura chuckles] -I found you.
You found me.
-I'll take my eyes and ears for a walk. -[Adam] Bye now.
[young Adam] You kids have fun.
-[sighs] Hey. -Hi.
-What's wrong? -I got shot.
-You got shot? -By a gun, yeah.
-Reed? -Yeah?
-Suck it up. -Yes, ma'am.
-You know what you have to do. -Nooooo. No, I came back for you.
translation.de: -Du weißt, was zu tun ist. -Nein. Ich bin wegen dir zurückgekommen.

translation.en: I know.
But we can't have a life here. Not like this.
translation.de: Aber wir können hier nicht leben. Nicht so.

translation.en: Now you have to go back to 2018, and you have to put things right.
translation.de: Du musst zurück ins Jahr 2018 und das in Ordnung bringen.

translation.en: -You have to put an end to all this. -What do you mean "put an end to it"?
translation.de: -Du musst das beenden. -Beenden? Was soll das heißen?

translation.en: I mean, stop time travel
translation.de: Das soll heißen… Verhindere die Zeitreisen und rette die Zukunft.

translation.en: from ever being invented and save the future.
translation.de: Verhindere die Zeitreisen und rette die Zukunft.

translation.en: Fine, come with me, and we'll--
Your jet is meshed for your DNA. It won't fly with anyone else.
translation.de: Dein Jet ist auf dich kodiert. Er fliegt nur mit dir.

translation.en: -You're smart. You can figure it out. -Adam!
We meet in the program. We meet there. Do you understand that? We can't…
translation.de: Wir treffen uns an der Uni. Verstehst du? Wir können nicht…

translation.en: If I go back and stop time travel, and that's an extremely big "if" with Sorian on my ass,
translation.de: Wenn ich die Zeitreisen verhindere, was dank Sorian eher unwahrscheinlich ist,

translation.en: we never meet.
We never happen.
We never happen, Laura.
We did happen.
Every moment we ever had will always have happened.
translation.de: Jeden Moment, den wir je hatten, wird es immer gegeben haben.

translation.en: Even if we correct the time stream,
translation.de: Selbst wenn wir den Zeitstrom ändern,

translation.en: somewhere in us will be the echo of this one.
translation.de: wird es irgendwo in uns das Echo hiervon geben.

translation.en: And we will find each other.
I really believe that.
What if we don't? What if… what if you're wrong? And you're probably wrong.
translation.de: Und wenn nicht? Wenn du dich irrst? Was du vermutlich tust.

translation.en: When am I ever wrong?
-Hey, hey. -[sobs] I can't do this again, okay?
translation.de: Hey. Ich schaffe das nicht noch mal, ok?

translation.en: I can't do this again, please. I can't afford to lose you. Don't do this.
translation.de: Ich kann dich nicht noch mal verlieren. Bitte tu das nicht.

translation.en: What is that?
They found us.
[gasping] Damn it!
There's a dirt road around the bend.
translation.de: Gleich da vorne ist ein Feldweg. Du musst zu deinem Jet.

translation.en: -I'll buy you time to get to your jet. -No, no, no. Hey. I'm not leaving.
translation.de: Gleich da vorne ist ein Feldweg. Du musst zu deinem Jet. -Nein. Hey, ich gehe nicht. -Du musst.

translation.en: -You have to. -What are you talking about?
translation.de: -Nein. Hey, ich gehe nicht. -Du musst. Nein, sie werden dich töten!

translation.en: -Those guys'll kill you. -No! I've had years--
translation.de: Nein, sie werden dich töten! Ich habe jahrelang geübt. Sie haben keine Chance geben mich.

translation.en: I've had years to rig my defenses. They'll never see me coming.
translation.de: Ich habe jahrelang geübt. Sie haben keine Chance geben mich.

translation.en: -If they catch you, it's over. -That's the only reason--
translation.de: -Kriegen sie dich, ist es vorbei. -Nur deshalb…

translation.en: Adam! Stop it! Please. [sobs]
I know you came for me.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du bist wegen mir hier.

translation.en: [sobbing] Now you have to leave for me, please.
translation.de: Und jetzt musst du wegen mir gehen.

translation.en: Please.
[whispers] We can fix this.
Hey, I love you.
That's why I know you're gonna find me again.
translation.de: Darum weiß ich, dass du mich wieder findest.

translation.en: Go.
Go!
God damn it!
Come on.
Come on.
Boom.
[Adam] Jet's not reading me because of my vitals. I'll need your DNA to start her up.
translation.de: Der Jet lehnt mich immer noch ab. Ich brauche deine DNA.

translation.en: When we get to altitude, the bio stop will come down, and then I can take over.
translation.de: Wenn wir oben sind, kann ich übernehmen.

translation.en: We have to move fast, or they'll be on us before we can jump to 2018.
translation.de: Beeil dich, sonst kriegen sie uns vor dem Sprung.

translation.en: -Wait. What? I'm not coming with you. -Yes, you are. Let's go. We need to go.
translation.de: -Was? Ich komme nicht mit. -Oh doch. Na los, es eilt.

translation.en: [Laura] Christos!
-[panting] -It's good to see you, buddy.
Laura, is that you?
You're not still mad at me for blowing up your jet, are you?
translation.de: Immer noch sauer, dass ich dich abgeschossen habe?

translation.en: If I'm being honest, yeah, I'm still kinda pissed.
translation.de: Wenn ich ehrlich bin… Ja, ich bin noch sauer.

translation.en: Will you stop and listen to me?
translation.de: Hörst du mir bitte mal zu?

translation.en: This is my fixed time. You already had my childhood.
translation.de: Das ist meine Fixzeit. Du hattest alles schon.

translation.en: You had adventures, you flew planes,
and I'm still the nerd with an inhaler who gets his ass kicked.
translation.de: und ich bin immer noch der Nerd mit dem Asthmaspray.

translation.en: I want the rest of it.
-Want the rest? -Yeah.
Here's the rest of it. Dad's death screws you up more than you ever realize.
translation.de: Ok, hier ist der Rest. Dads Tod setzt dir mehr zu, als du denkst.

translation.en: You get depressed. You get angry. You wander around school without making a social dent.
translation.de: Du wirst depressiv und wütend. Hast keine Freunde in der Schule.

translation.en: College is a high point, until after a year, you lose your scholarship
translation.de: Höhepunkt ist das College. Du verlierst dein Stipendium,

translation.en: for something that is so unbelievably stupid I cannot even say it out loud right now.
translation.de: wegen etwas, das so unglaublich dumm ist, dass ich es nicht mal aussprechen kann.

translation.en: You end up in the air force. Turns out you could really fly.
translation.de: Du landest bei der Air Force. Du bist ein guter Pilot.

translation.en: And then along comes time travel, and the whole world starts to fall apart
translation.de: Dann kommen die Zeitreisen, und alles geht den Bach runter.

translation.en: until the only woman you have… the only woman you ever loved gets taken away.
translation.de: Bis dir die einzige Frau, die du je geliebt hast, genommen wird.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
Till you lose…
She… she just gets taken away.
-There's gotta be more than that. -[Adam] There is, kid.
translation.de: Da muss noch mehr sein. Ja, Kleiner. Und dank Sorian ist nichts davon gut.

translation.en: And thanks to Sorian, none of it's good.
translation.de: Ja, Kleiner. Und dank Sorian ist nichts davon gut.

translation.en: We can fix it.
-By destroying time travel? -That's right.
How are we gonna do that? What's your plan?
translation.de: Und wie? Was ist dein Plan?

translation.en: I'm not gonna explain my plan to a nerd with an inhaler--
translation.de: Den verrate ich doch keinem Nerd mit einem…

translation.en: -You don't have a plan. -Because I do not have a plan. -Exactly. -That is correct.
translation.de: -Du hast keinen Plan. -Habe ich nicht. Korrekt.

translation.en: But I know somebody who might.
You're gonna find Dad.
[Adam] Nope.
We're gonna find Dad.
So are you in or are you--
Tell your husband to get his bitch ass out here.
translation.de: Sag deinem Mann, er soll rauskommen.

translation.en: He's busy right now,
but I'll tell him you stopped by.
translation.de: Aber ich richte ihm Grüße aus.

translation.en: Hello, Laura.
You should have stayed dead the first time.
Now, where is your husband?
Here we go. All right, give me your hand.
translation.de: Alles klar. Ok, gib mir deine Hand.

translation.en: -[whirring] -Like that, yep.
Nice, healthy DNA right there.
Okay, we'll park it down there,
translation.de: Ok, und jetzt lehn dich zurück,

translation.en: grab on to that railing,
hold on for dear life, and try not to pass out from the G's, okay?
translation.de: halt dich gut fest und versuch, nicht von den Gs ohnmächtig zu werden.

translation.en: What's a… Jesus!
-What's happening? -That.
[young Adam yelps] What are you doing?
Gotcha!
I told you to hang on.
Don't give me that stink eye.
Where you going?
Shit!
[Adam] Okay, hold tight. I've always wanted to try this.
translation.de: Ok, festhalten. Das wollte ich immer mal probieren.

translation.en: [young Adam] Did you just turn the plane off?
[Adam] Yes, I did.
[young Adam] Oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
translation.de: -Ja, habe ich. -Oh mein Gott. Oh mein Gott!

translation.en: oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God, oh my God,
Where the hell are they?
-[Christos] They gotta be here somewhere. -[Sorian] Adam, check your ion readings.
translation.de: Irgendwo hier sind sie. Adam, checken Sie Ihre Ionenwerte.

translation.en: The reactor's damaged.
You have one jump left.
If you don't come back now, you never will.
translation.de: Wenn Sie jetzt nicht zurückkommen, kommen Sie nie zurück.

translation.en: What do you say, kid? Your call.
translation.de: Was sagst du, Junge? Du entscheidest.

translation.en: We don't pull this off, we're not gettin' back, either one of us.
translation.de: Wenn wir das nicht machen, kommt keiner von uns zurück.

translation.en: -Punch that shit. -Oh yeah!
Gotcha.
-♪ Well, my temperature's rising… ♪ -Come on!
-♪ Crazy people knockin'… ♪ -Adam! I got this.
Come on, Reed. Come on.
-[young Adam] Adam! -[Adam] I got it!
-Adam! -I got it!
-[young Adam] Adam! -♪ So glad we made it… ♪
Come on!
-Let's not… -[alarm bleeping]
Die!
[man] It's not meant to be easy.
Listen, guys, instead of moaning about it,
translation.de: Hören Sie… Jammern Sie nicht rum,

translation.en: give yourself permission to be inadequate, and then get to work.
translation.de: sondern erlauben Sie sich Fehler. Und dann an die Arbeit.

translation.en: You can't be good at something unless you're willing to be… -[blows raspberry] …at it first. -[laughter]
translation.de: Man kann nur gut in etwas sein, wenn man erst mal mies sein darf.

translation.en: -Professor Reed. -Sophie.
It'll take two semesters just to begin solving that. [Louis] Oh, good God, at least that.
translation.de: -Das wird mindestens zwei Semester dauern. -Mein Gott, mindestens.

translation.en: [Sophie] Even then, we'll fail the class, because this is bonkers.
translation.de: Selbst dann fallen wir durch, weil das irre ist.

translation.en: [Louis] Sophie, you can do this.
Listen, guys, that is the beauty of physics.
translation.de: Hören Sie, das ist das Schöne an der Physik.

translation.en: [voice fading] That is the beauty of life…
translation.de: Das ist das Schöne am Leben.

translation.en: It's really him.
-Yep. -[Louis] If you think you've got…
He's so…
[Adam] Yeah.
Alive. Come here for a second. Hey.
-Let me do the talking in there. -We have to tell him what happens.
translation.de: Überlass mir das Reden. -Wir müssen es ihm sagen. -Wir sagen ihm nichts, ok?

translation.en: -He doesn't have to die. -We say nothing, okay?
translation.de: -Wir müssen es ihm sagen. -Wir sagen ihm nichts, ok?

translation.en: Only what he needs to know. Everything else… we can't.
translation.de: Nur, was er wissen muss. Alles andere… Nein.

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it, "I won't tell him." Say it.
translation.de: Sag es. "Ich sage nichts." Na los.

translation.en: -Say it. -I won't tell him.
Physics is a slog. It's a slog.
We are meant to work on problems that our children will solve.
translation.de: Wir arbeiten an Problemen, die unsere Kinder lösen werden.

translation.en: You might find the odd solution here or there.
translation.de: Manchmal findet man vielleicht eine Lösung.

translation.en: I just got your shirt, by the way. It's very clever.
But you will die before your life's work is done.
translation.de: Aber Sie werden sterben, bevor Ihr Lebenswerk vollbracht ist.

translation.en: Your cold, lifeless husk will be moldering in the ground
translation.de: Ihre leblosen Hüllen werden in der Erde zerfallen,

translation.en: while generations that come after you
will be finishing the work that you started.
To quote the Romans,
"Enjoy yourselves. It's later than you think."
translation.de: "Genießt es. Es ist später als ihr denkt."

translation.en: [Adam] Guy Lombardo.
-I am s… I'm sorry? -[Adam] Guy Lombardo. That was… Yeah.
The quote, um… "It's later than you think." It's not the Romans.
translation.de: Das Zitat ist nicht von den Römern.

translation.en: It's a singer. Guy Lombardo and his Royal Canadians.
translation.de: Es ist von einem Sänger. Guy Lombardo und den Royal Canadians.

translation.en: It was Guy Lombardo,
and it was from his 1949 classic, "Enjoy Yourself."
But long before that,
it was the Romans who etched it on their sundials.
translation.de: ritzten es die Römer in ihre Sonnenuhren.

translation.en: So, uh… so we're both right.
It's interesting that you, uh… you know that.
I'm sorry, do I know you?
Just auditing the class. [chuckles]
Any other questions?
All right, the, uh, reading's on my website, and I'll see you Tuesday.
translation.de: Ok, der Stoff ist auf meiner Website. Wir sehen uns am Dienstag.

translation.en: [Louis] Adam?
Is… is this time travel?
-[Louis] He came from 2050 and got you? -[young Adam] Yes.
translation.de: Er ist also aus 2050 und hat dich geholt. Ja.

translation.en: -How old are you now? -[young Adam] Twelve.
-Why did you need your 12-year-old self? -[Adam] I didn't.
-You needed me to fly the jet. -Jet? There… there's a jet?
translation.de: -Ich musste den Jet fliegen. -Jet? Es gibt einen Jet?

translation.en: -My jet. -Oh. What I meant was I didn't need you originally.
translation.de: Ja, meinen Jet. Ursprünglich, meinte ich.

translation.en: -2022 was a mistake. -Wh--
And you flew this jet?
-Yes. -Did you, though?
-Is that my jacket? Looks tight on you. -That's what I said.
-It's fine. -Like a condom with buttons.
-This is fun. I'm having fun, are you? -Condom!
And why was 2022 a mistake?
-I wasn't supposed to be there. -You're not supposed to be here.
translation.de: -Ich durfte nicht dort sein. -Hier auch nicht.

translation.en: -You don't say. -They shot him when he stole the jet.
translation.de: Ach was. -Das passierte, als er den Jet stahl. -Bitte lass das.

translation.en: -Please don't tell him that. -You stole a jet?
translation.de: -Das passierte, als er den Jet stahl. -Bitte lass das.

translation.en: -Why would he need to know that? -Okay, stop. Both of you stop talking now.
translation.de: -Warum muss er das wissen? -Ok, stopp. Haltet beide mal die Luft an.

translation.en: Do you realize how absolutely wrong this is?
translation.de: Ist euch klar, wie falsch das ist?

translation.en: You can't be here. You can't be anywhere but your own timeline.
translation.de: Ihr dürft nur in eurer eigenen Zeitlinie sein.

translation.en: What do you think we're doin' here? Think we're short of hugs in the future?
translation.de: Denkst du, wir sind wegen der Umarmungen hier?

translation.en: -There's a reason I need to talk to you. -I don't-- I don't care.
translation.de: -Ich muss mit dir reden. -Ist mir egal.

translation.en: -He doesn't care. -Don't get me wrong.
I'm very happy to see you, and I mean this in the best possible way,
translation.de: Ich bin sehr froh, euch zu sehen. Ganz ehrlich.

translation.en: but you need to piss off to where you came from.
Anything you say or do could cause a divergence.
translation.de: Alles, was ihr tut, könnte zu Divergenzen führen.

translation.en: Can you please shut up for a second?
-I'm not gonna listen-- -For a second and listen.
-Shut the physics fountain in your face. -What you are doing is reckless.
translation.de: Dreh mal deinen Gesichtshahn ab. Dad!

translation.en: [young Adam] You okay?
-God damn it! -[groaning]
-[Adam] In fairness, I-- -It's okay. I asked him nicely to shut up and listen.
translation.de: Um fair zu bleiben, ich habe ihn nett gebeten zuzuhören.

translation.en: -He did no such thing, so… -It's okay. It's fine. I'm fine.
translation.de: -Hat er aber nicht. -Alles gut, ich bin ok.

translation.en: That's what you get. We don't hit people in this family.
translation.de: Das hast du davon. Bei uns wird nicht geschlagen.

translation.en: What was that?
-That's what you get. -God!
How did you turn out to be an asshole? I thought you loved me.
translation.de: Wie konntest du so ein Arsch werden? Ich dachte, du liebst mich.

translation.en: -I do! -None of it matters anymore.
-Are you kidding me? Of course it matters. -Dad.
translation.de: Wie bitte? Klar ist es das. -Dad… -Es ist wichtig.

translation.en: They don't have safeguards where you come from? -Dad. -Protocols?
-Maya and I agreed. -Dad. -There'd be an ethics panel-- -Dad! With real oversight.
translation.de: Maya und ich sind für einen Ethikrat mit echter Kontrollfunktion.

translation.en: None of it matters anymore.
Wait. It already happened? Somebody already altered time?
translation.de: Wartet, es ist schon passiert? Jemand hat die Zeit geändert?

translation.en: -Who? -Sorian.
She'd never do that. She knows the consequences.
-She's been funding my work for years. -The Adam Project.
Yes, I theorized that with a powerful enough pulse,
translation.de: Ja, meine Theorie, dass wir mit einem starken Impuls

translation.en: we could generate utilitarian wormholes in space.
And we did it four weeks ago.
But I was… I was just playing with the theory that you can use wormholes for time travel.
translation.de: Aber ich habe nur mit der Idee gespielt, dass man sie für Zeitreisen nutzen kann.

translation.en: That part's theoretical.
-Right. -Still theoretical.
This theory needs to take a leak. So let's go.
translation.de: Diese Theorie muss mal pissen. Also los.

translation.en: Holy shit! I'm the godfather of time travel?
translation.de: Heilige Scheiße! Ich habe das Zeitreisen erfunden?

translation.en: Nice hit, Dad. [whispers] I think I broke my hand.
translation.de: -Guter Schlag, Dad. -Ich glaube, meine Hand ist gebrochen.

translation.en: [Louis] I'm… I'm sorry. This is my fault.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Das ist meine Schuld.

translation.en: My… my ego. My hubris.
My need to be best, to be first, to be the smartest guy in the room.
translation.de: Ich muss immer der Beste, der Erste, der Klügste sein.

translation.en: And here we are.
-A disgusting character flaw. -He didn't know.
-[Louis] But I should have. -Yeah.
Mankind has no business tampering with the mechanics of the universe.
translation.de: Die Menschheit sollte nicht mit der Mechanik des Universums spielen.

translation.en: There are forces greater than science.
Right. That's why we're gonna put the genie back in the bottle.
translation.de: Eben. Und darum muss der Geist zurück in die Flasche.

translation.en: Destroy time travel before it's even invented.
translation.de: Wir vernichten es, bevor es erfunden wird.

translation.en: What's done, no matter how terrible,
translation.de: Was geschehen ist, egal wie schrecklich,

translation.en: should not and cannot be undone under any circumstance.
translation.de: darf unter keinen Umständen rückgängig gemacht werden.

translation.en: Even us being here, talking like this, we're perverting fate and time.
translation.de: Selbst, dass wir hier reden, verdirbt Schicksal und Zeit.

translation.en: I told you Sorian already did that. She's had the world by the balls since.
translation.de: Das hat Sorian bereits. Und seitdem hat sie die Welt an den Eiern.

translation.en: And you know that for a fact?
Do you have scientific proof that she changed things?
No, you don't because you can't know. But I will tell you this.
translation.de: Nein, das kannst du nicht wissen. Aber weißt du was?

translation.en: You being here opens up the potential for catastrophic reconfiguration.
translation.de: Dass ihr hier seid, könnte katastrophale Folgen haben.

translation.en: -And that is quantifiable, that-- -Stop. Stop.
-Stop. -Stop what?
-Stop being a scientist. -But I am a scient--
Be a father.
You were always more interested in the universe than your son.
translation.de: Das All war dir immer wichtiger als dein Sohn.

translation.en: -That's not true. -[Adam] That is true. And when you're older, you'll realize that. It--
translation.de: -Das ist nicht wahr. -Doch. Du wirst es noch merken.

translation.en: You know what? It's…
That ship has sailed. It's too late for me. So, you know, whatever. I'm fine.
translation.de: Für mich ist der Zug abgefahren. Vergiss mich. Mir geht's gut.

translation.en: But he needs you.
And you? What do you need?
I need to go for a walk.
I can't be here, Adam. I… I have to go.
translation.de: Ich darf nicht hier sein. Ich muss gehen.

translation.en: -Please don't go. -I have to.
-Please. -This is… this is bigger than any of us.
It's too dangerous what he's asking me to do. I can't.
translation.de: Es ist zu gefährlich. Ich kann das nicht.

translation.en: All right. We'll see each other again.
translation.de: Ist ja gut. Wir sehen uns wieder.

translation.en: Wait.
-I need to tell you something. -No, you can't say anything else to me.
translation.de: -Ich muss dir etwas sagen. -Nein, du darfst mir nichts mehr sagen.

translation.en: I can't know the future.
I'm sorry.
I have to go home. Your mom and you are waiting.
translation.de: Ich muss nach Hause. Zu deiner Mom und dir.

translation.en: [woman] Yes, Senator.
Except the stability of these wormholes is no longer a hypothetical,
translation.de: Nur ist die Stabilität dieser Wurmlöcher nicht mehr hypothetisch

translation.en: and the work we are doing here is simply ahead of the current statutes.
translation.de: und unsere Arbeit hier den aktuellen Statuten schlichtweg voraus.

translation.en: So you can either support my program and be a part of the future,
translation.de: Sie können mich also unterstützen und Teil der Zukunft sein,

translation.en: or you can get left behind in the past.
[Sorian] Hang up the phone.
What are you doing here? You said I wouldn't be seeing you again.
translation.de: Was tust du hier? Du sagtest, wir sähen uns nie wieder.

translation.en: Did I? Hmm.
When was that? Remind me.
[Maya] The last time you just showed up, two months ago.
translation.de: Als du das letzte Mal hier warst, vor zwei Monaten.

translation.en: Oh, well, for me, it was 32 years ago.
translation.de: Oh, na ja. Für mich war das vor 32 Jahren.

translation.en: So sorry if I'm a little fuzzy on the details.
translation.de: Sorry, wenn ich nicht mehr alles weiß.

translation.en: Anyway, times have changed.
translation.de: Wie auch immer, die Zeiten haben sich geändert.

translation.en: You can't be here.
You know the potential for catastrophic changes to the time stream.
translation.de: Du weißt, welche Folgen das für den Zeitstrom haben könnte.

translation.en: -It's incalculable. -God, I was such a nerd. Will you please just stop talking?
translation.de: -Es ist unberechenbar. -Gott, war ich nerdig. Hör auf.

translation.en: Everything you asked me to do.
The stock buys, the offshore accounts, all of it. It's unethical.
translation.de: Die Aktien, die Offshorekonten, alles. Das ist unethisch.

translation.en: -And illegal. -This isn't a joke. It's dangerous.
translation.de: Und illegal. Das ist kein Witz. Es ist gefährlich.

translation.en: The environmental impact alone from the companies you had me pick could be devastating.
translation.de: Allein die Umweltbelastungen durch die Firmen könnten verheerend sein.

translation.en: In fairness to us,
translation.de: Ehrlich gesagt war die Umwelt schon kaputt,

translation.en: the environment was pretty much toast before we came along.
translation.de: Ehrlich gesagt war die Umwelt schon kaputt, bevor es uns gab.

translation.en: And by the way, Maya, you did it, all of it,
translation.de: Und außerdem, Maya… Du hast es getan. Alles.

translation.en: because somewhere inside that cheap suit and ridiculous ponytail is me.
translation.de: Weil irgendwo unter diesem billigen Anzug und dem lächerlichen Zopf ich stecke.

translation.en: I'm leaving.
Where you going?
You seeing someone?
No, you're not. You're too busy.
[clicks tongue] Thing is, you always will be.
translation.de: Nur wirst du das immer sein.

translation.en: This company is all you will ever have. -[sighs] -It is your personal life.
translation.de: Diese Firma ist alles, was du je haben wirst. Sie ist dein Leben.

translation.en: It's your family.
But this is our legacy.
And if we had let the government take it from us,
translation.de: Und wenn wir zulassen, dass die Regierung es uns nimmt,

translation.en: then everything we sacrificed,
translation.de: ist alles, was wir geopfert haben,

translation.en: all that loneliness,
all that loneliness,
would've been for nothing.
And I did it.
I fixed that future where we had been forgotten.
translation.de: Ich habe die Zukunft verändert, in der man uns vergessen hat.

translation.en: Then why are you back here now?
translation.de: Warum bist du dann wieder hier?

translation.en: I'm back
translation.de: Ich bin hier, weil wir das Zeitreisen nicht kontrollieren können,

translation.en: because we can't control time travel if it never existed.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, weil wir das Zeitreisen nicht kontrollieren können, wenn es nie existiert hat.

translation.en: And your buddy Adam Reed is about to betray you.
translation.de: Und dein Kumpel Adam Reed wird dich hintergehen.

translation.en: Adam? He's just a little kid.
translation.de: Adam? Er ist nur ein kleines Kind.

translation.en: Yeah, well, that little kid…
[laughs] …he grows up to be a very big pain in our ass.
translation.de: wird uns mal sehr auf die Nerven gehen.

translation.en: [sighs] Trust me. You're gonna want this.
translation.de: Vertrau mir, du wirst das wollen.

translation.en: What?
I know you think you know more than me because you're older.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hältst dich für schlauer, weil du älter bist.

translation.en: Go away, Adam. [sighs]
And I know why you hate him so much.
translation.de: Und ich weiß, warum du ihn hasst.

translation.en: Really?
[laughs] Well, do tell. I'm on the edge of my seat here.
translation.de: Schieß los, das interessiert mich nämlich brennend.

translation.en: Holy shit. I wonder what it i-- Was it because he's narcissistic,
translation.de: Scheiße, was ist es? Weil er ein Narzisst ist?

translation.en: or, uh, never came home from work or cared more about his job than his son--
translation.de: Weil er nie zu Hause war? Weil sein Job wichtiger war als sein Sohn?

translation.en: It's because he died.
You hate him
because he died.
You made yourself hate him
translation.de: Du hast dich gezwungen, ihn zu hassen.

translation.en: because it was easier than missing him.
translation.de: Weil es einfacher war als ihn zu vermissen.

translation.en: And I remember some stuff that you maybe don't wanna.
translation.de: Und ich weiß Dinge, die du vielleicht verdrängt hast.

translation.en: Oh yeah?
Like what?
He played catch with us almost every night.
translation.de: Er hat fast jeden Abend mit uns Ball gespielt.

translation.en: Catch.
He'd get home from work,
be so tired, and I'd be in the yard throwing the ball against the pitch back.
translation.de: war hundemüde, und ich spielte draußen mit dem Wurfnetz.

translation.en: -You remember the pitch back, right? -Oh, I… I remember the pitch back.
translation.de: Erinnerst du dich daran? Oh, ich erinnere mich daran.

translation.en: Yeah, he bought it so he didn't have to play with me.
translation.de: Er hat es gekauft, um nicht mit mir spielen zu müssen.

translation.en: Nope.
He bought it because they had one in the window of Altman's.
translation.de: Er hat es gekauft, weil eins im Fenster von Altman's stand.

translation.en: And every time we passed that store,
translation.de: Und immer wenn wir dort vorbeigingen,

translation.en: I begged him to buy it for me,
translation.de: flehte ich ihn an, es mir zu kaufen.

translation.en: so that's what Dad did.
He'd see me throwin' in the yard, and no matter how tired he was,
translation.de: Er sah mich im Garten, und egal wie müde er war,

translation.en: he'd always grab his mitt to come out for a catch.
translation.de: er kam immer raus und fing ein paar Bälle.

translation.en: Things happened to you, to us.
translation.de: Es war nicht einfach für dich. Für uns.

translation.en: And we suck at dealing with it.
translation.de: Und wir kommen nicht damit klar.

translation.en: I'm starting to think it's something we do.
I give Mom a hard time now, and…
translation.de: Ich mache Mom das Leben schwer und…

translation.en: I think…
I think it's easier to be angry than it is to be sad.
translation.de: Es ist leichter, wütend als traurig zu sein.

translation.en: And I guess, when I get older,
translation.de: Und ich schätze, wenn ich älter werde,

translation.en: I forget that there's a difference.
How'd you get to be so smart?
How'd you get to be so dumb?
Nice try, asshole.
[Ellie] Adam, make sure you feed Hawking before you leave for school, honey.
translation.de: Adam, vergiss nicht, Hawking vor der Schule zu füttern.

translation.en: -You're still here. -[Louis] Oh. And you're cooking. What are you making? Hi.
translation.de: Du bist noch hier? Und du kochst. Was machst du?

translation.en: Uh, I know you like the Denver omelet.
That's not a Denver omelet. That is a cry for help.
translation.de: Das ist kein Denver-Omelett, das ist ein Hilferuf.

translation.en: The eggs are burnt, and the bacon's still somehow totally raw.
translation.de: Die Eier sind verbrannt, und der Speck ist noch roh.

translation.en: Oh, you… Oh, no, no. No, no, no. Wha--
Do you wanna talk about why you're still here instead of being at work?
translation.de: Willst du darüber reden, warum du nicht arbeitest?

translation.en: I… I… Well, I just wanted to stay home with you today.
translation.de: Ich wollte heute einfach zu Hause bei euch bleiben.

translation.en: You don't say. I like this guy.
translation.de: Was du nicht sagst. Ich mag diesen Kerl.

translation.en: This guy likes you.
What's going on with you, honey?
Does he seem, uh… does he seem sad to you?
No.
He's an odd duck, like his dad.
translation.de: Er ist eben ein Kauz, wie sein Vater.

translation.en: I happen to collect odd ducks.
I don't know if I should've built that game for him. Shouldn't he be outside, playing with the rest of the kids?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ihm das Spiel gut tut. Sollte er nicht mit anderen spielen?

translation.en: How is he gonna find his place in the world?
translation.de: Wie soll er seinen Platz in der Welt finden?

translation.en: "His place in the world"? He's a kid. We're his place in the world.
translation.de: "Seinen Platz in der Welt"? Er ist ein Kind, wir sind sein Platz.

translation.en: You're his place in the world.
[sighs] Okay, whatever is going on, listen, I can tell you the truth
translation.de: Ok, was auch immer dich bedrückt, ich kann dir die Wahrheit sagen

translation.en: or something that's gonna make you feel better.
I'd rather cut to it and tell you the truth, if you're up for it.
I… I'd rather something that'll make me feel better.
translation.de: Ich würde lieber etwas hören, -was mich aufmuntert. -Ja, ich weiß.

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah, I know.
Kidding. Sort of. Okay, tell me.
translation.de: War nur Spaß. Mehr oder weniger. Ok, sag schon.

translation.en: When you are with us… [clicks tongue]
…you're with us 100%.
It's amazing.
And when you're not… [laughs] …it's like… pfft.
translation.de: Und wenn du nicht hier bist, dann…

translation.en: So is he a little lonely?
Yeah, probably.
But does that make you a shitty guy? No.
translation.de: Aber bist du deshalb ein Scheißkerl? Nein.

translation.en: I've gotta do better.
Hey, buddy, I have good news for you.
translation.de: Hey, Kumpel, ich habe gute Neuigkeiten für dich.

translation.en: He doesn't need perfect. He just needs you.
translation.de: Perfekt braucht er nicht. Er braucht nur dich.

translation.en: Your cooking makes you a borderline serial killer, but the rest of you is pretty awesome.
translation.de: Als Koch hast du Serienkillerpotenzial, aber der Rest von dir ist ziemlich toll.

translation.en: Ellie.
You know I love you. Yeah, I know.
translation.de: -Weißt du, dass ich dich liebe? -Ja, ich weiß.

translation.en: I'm extremely lovable.
Yeah.
I have to go to work.
Okay, okay, okay.
-And, hey, you got time. -[sighs]
"It's later than you think."
[young Adam] Really think we can?
Maybe, maybe not. We'll see.
translation.de: Vielleicht, vielleicht auch nicht. Mal sehen.

translation.en: But we're gonna try anyway. Destroy time travel. How will we do that?
translation.de: Aber wir versuchen es. Wir zerstören das Zeitreisen. Nur wie?

translation.en: This is the world's largest electromagnetic accelerator.
translation.de: Das ist der größte Elektronenbeschleuniger der Welt.

translation.en: It's 2018, so EM technology isn't stable yet.
translation.de: Aber in 2018 ist die Technologie noch nicht stabil.

translation.en: So here's what we're gonna do. We're gonna blow this bitch up.
translation.de: Mein Plan ist: Wir jagen das Scheißding in die Luft.

translation.en: -Blow it up? -Yep.
How did I live this long? That's a terrible idea.
translation.de: Wie habe ich so lange überlebt? Das ist ein Scheißplan.

translation.en: Yeah, well, when a bad idea is the only idea, it becomes a great idea.
translation.de: Wenn ein Scheißplan der einzige Plan ist, ist es ein guter Plan.

translation.en: Who said that?
You. Nine years from now, right before you get arrested.
translation.de: -Wer sagt das? -Du. -In neun Jahren, bevor du verhaftet wirst. -Was?

translation.en: -What? -Try to focus.
We'll have to deal with security. You know this bag of toys you love?
translation.de: Konzentration, das Gebäude ist gesichert. -Erinnerst du dich an meine Tasche? -Ja?

translation.en: Yeah.
Being a geek is about to pay off.
translation.de: Ein Nerd zu sein, zahlt sich jetzt aus.

translation.en: -Reading me? -[young Adam] Roger that, Red Leader.
translation.de: Hörst du mich? Roger, Red Leader.

translation.en: This is Butternut Sippy Cup. Ten-four, over.
Let's just talk like normal people, okay?
translation.de: Reden wir wie normale Leute, ok?

translation.en: [young Adam] Copy that…
Somethin's wrong.
There's nobody here.
Which means they're here.
Sorian warned her younger self we were coming. Are you sure?
Oh, pretty sure.
-Don't move. On your knees. -I'm sorry. What?
We're taking you back to 2050, Reed.
translation.de: Wir bringen dich zurück ins Jahr 2050.

translation.en: I can't hear you through the helmet. It muffles a bit. It's hard to hear you.
translation.de: Ich kann dich nicht hören. Der Helm dämpft alles so.

translation.en: Don't get me wrong, your outfits are incredible though.
translation.de: Aber eure Outfits sind der Wahnsinn.

translation.en: They're intimidating but also scream, "Please don't hurt me."
translation.de: Sie sind einschüchternd, sagen aber auch: "Tu mir nicht weh."

translation.en: [soldier] On your knees. I won't tell you again. Well, you… you're right about that.
translation.de: -Auf die Knie, ich sag's nicht noch mal. -Tja, da gebe ich dir recht.

translation.en: Adam, what are you doing? I'm about to get my ass kicked.
translation.de: Adam? Mir wird hier gleich der Arsch versohlt.

translation.en: Don't worry. He doesn't wanna fight. They wanna fight. They really, really wanna fight.
translation.de: -Schon gut, er will nicht kämpfen. -Doch, das wollen sie. Glaub mir.

translation.en: Just look him in the eyes and smile.
translation.de: Schau ihm in die Augen und lächle.

translation.en: Smile in a way that says, "I want this." "I've been waiting my whole life for this."
translation.de: Mit einem Lächeln, das sagt: "Nur zu. Darauf warte ich schon ewig."

translation.en: Then hit him in the private bathing suit parts.
translation.de: Dann haust du ihm in die Bikinizonen-Weichteile.

translation.en: -Adam! -Roger that.
Yeah!
Adam, you're on those cars, right?
translation.de: Adam? Die Autos übernimmst du, oder?

translation.en: Roger that, middle-aged Adam.
Bye. Pfft.
That was invigorating!
-I'm sorry. Are you okay? -This close!
-That was amazing. -This close!
-Where's little Adam? -He's fine!
-Hey, hey! -Hey? That's your mother's car.
The car?
What are you doin' here?
I went to the motel, and when I didn't find you there,
translation.de: Na ja, als ihr nicht im Motel wart,

translation.en: I… I figured I'd find you here.
It's not like you're keeping a low profile, obviously.
translation.de: Ihr geht ja nicht gerade unauffällig vor.

translation.en: What the hell is this?
Tell you what? You come up with a plan, and we'll do it your way. Sound good?
translation.de: Hey, weißt du was? Denk dir doch selber einen Plan aus, ok?

translation.en: Oh God. Thank God. There's a plan.
translation.de: Gott sei Dank, es gibt einen Plan.

translation.en: I was beginning to think you were making this up as you went along.
translation.de: Und ich dachte schon, ihr improvisiert einfach nur.

translation.en: Adam, I'm goin' inside. Cover the perimeter.
-No one gets in behind me. -Sorry. That was harsh.
[Adam] Harsh? You shaved my ass with a Subaru.
translation.de: Übertrieben? Du hast mich mit einem Subaru rasiert.

translation.en: I… I saved your ass with a Subaru, son.
translation.de: Ich habe dich mit einem Subaru gerettet.

translation.en: What's Dad doing?
-Dad's being critical. Big surprise. -Okay, I--
You're trying to break into a highly sensitive, secure facility with a sixth-grader.
translation.de: Du brichst in eine sichere Anlage ein, mit einem Sechstklässler.

translation.en: I am not being critical. I'm… I'm narrating.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht kritisch, ich beschreibe Tatsachen.

translation.en: Will you just stop? Stop. Where the hell are you going?
translation.de: Bleibst du bitte mal stehen? Wo willst du hin?

translation.en: To destroy your accelerator, and I'm gonna enjoy it.
translation.de: Ich werde das Ding zerstören und es genießen.

translation.en: Do you realize that you have broken every rule?
translation.de: Du hast gegen jede Regel verstoßen,

translation.en: You've blown past every conceivable ethical boundary like it wasn't there.
translation.de: jede ethische Grenze überschritten, als gäbe es sie nicht.

translation.en: Yeah? Then why are you here, Dad?
translation.de: Ja? Warum bist du dann hier, Dad?

translation.en: Because you can't do it without me.
translation.de: Weil du es ohne mich nicht schaffst.

translation.en: Some people dream of the future.
translation.de: Manche Menschen träumen von der Zukunft.

translation.en: Here at Sorian Technologies, we're building it.
translation.de: Hier bei Sorian Technologies erschaffen wir sie.

translation.en: [Louis] If you destroy the accelerator, Sorian will simply rebuild it.
translation.de: Wenn du ihn zerstörst, baut Sorian einfach einen neuen.

translation.en: -[Adam] So what will work? -[Louis] What you're after is ISPCA.
Infinitely Shifting Plasma Containing Algorithm, which I designed to stabilize the wormholes.
translation.de: Meinen Algorithmus, um die Wurmlöcher zu stabilisieren.

translation.en: That is the mathematical equation that will make time travel possible.
translation.de: Die mathematische Gleichung, die Zeitreisen ermöglicht.

translation.en: How do you destroy math?
I've never written the algorithm down or demonstrated it to another human being,
translation.de: Ich habe es nie aufgeschrieben oder jemand anderem gezeigt.

translation.en: so it lives here in the old bean,
and in the subbasement in a diamond-hard neuromorphic processor.
translation.de: Und im Keller. In einem diamantharten, neuromorphen Prozessor.

translation.en: Are you talking about your penis?
Can… can we be serious now? Yes. No. Yes.
-It's a hard drive, okay? -[chuckles]
-God, you're such a child. -Sorry.
There is a crystal hard drive running the algorithm in a closed loop.
translation.de: Sie führt den Algorithmus in einer geschlossenen Schleife aus.

translation.en: That is the nerve center of the accelerator.
So we go there, destroy the hard drive, prevent time travel from being invented.
translation.de: Ok, wir zerstören sie also und verhindern damit das Zeitreisen.

translation.en: Theoretically, time travel--
Oh my God! You're killing me with the theoretical.
translation.de: Gott, dein Theoriekram macht mich verrückt.

translation.en: -Yes, that should do it. -Good. Let's do that.
-Okay. Okay. -Okay. Okay.
-This is where you work. -Yes.
Only took you 44 years to bring me here.
translation.de: Hast nur 44 Jahre gebraucht, um es mir zu zeigen.

translation.en: Fair.
I am so keeping this thing.
translation.de: Das Ding behalte ich sowas von.

translation.en: -[Adam] So this is it? -[Louis] This is it.
I gotta hand it to you, Dad. You were not messin' around.
translation.de: Eins muss ich dir lassen, du hast nicht Däumchen gedreht.

translation.en: This is where we house the hard drive.
-[Adam] What happens if you pull it out? -[Louis] One of two things.
translation.de: -Und wenn man sie entfernt? -Kann zweierlei passieren.

translation.en: The accelerator will continue to run on a dormant loop.
translation.de: Der Beschleuniger läuft im Ruhezustand weiter,

translation.en: But without the algorithm, no one will ever be able to program it again.
translation.de: aber ohne den Algorithmus kann ihn niemand mehr programmieren.

translation.en: Or?
Or there's a cataclysmic meltdown
that will destroy all living things within 100 miles.
translation.de: die alles Leben im Umkreis von 150 km zerstört.

translation.en: Well, let's hope it's the first thing.
[computer] Neuromorphic hard drive panel accessed.
Screw it.
[Maya] Louis.
[Louis] Maya?
Long time no see.
Oh, this shit's about to get weird.
Were you really gonna steal that from us? Destroy everything we've worked for?
translation.de: Wolltest du das wirklich stehlen? Und unsere gesamte Arbeit vernichten?

translation.en: [Louis] Our work was supposed to have moral ground rules.
-We were gonna change the world. -Change the world?
The only thing that's changed is you. Have you lost your mind?
translation.de: Verändert hast nur du dich. Bist du irre?

translation.en: All these years, I funded your work.
translation.de: Ich habe deine Arbeit all die Jahre finanziert.

translation.en: I'm not the villain here. I spent millions--
translation.de: Ich bin nicht die Böse. Ich habe Millionen…

translation.en: Hundreds of millions of my money, my wealth.
translation.de: Hunderte Millionen meines Geldes, meines Vermögens

translation.en: -Mmm. -Just to fund your every indulgence.
translation.de: Hunderte Millionen meines Geldes, meines Vermögens sind in die Finanzierung deiner Späße geflossen. Aber das hier…

translation.en: But this…
translation.de: sind in die Finanzierung deiner Späße geflossen. Aber das hier…

translation.en: this is mine to do with as I please.
translation.de: Das gehört mir. Ich kann damit machen, was ich will.

translation.en: Now,
give me… the drive.
No.
Just… no.
I thought you were gonna say that.
translation.de: Ich dachte, dass Sie das sagen.

translation.en: Come here.
Gimme the gun.
Maya, Jesus Christ.
What are you doing? Are you crazy? Oh, I think that's well established.
translation.de: -Was tust du, bist du verrückt? -Oh, das trifft wohl zu.

translation.en: Adam, just listen to her.
It's okay. It's all right.
'Cause Adam's gonna give me the drive right now.
translation.de: Denn Adam wird mir die Festplatte jetzt geben.

translation.en: Aren't you, Adam?
-Adam? -Adam?
[Sorian] Hey, beautiful idiot. If I shoot him, you die too.
translation.de: -Adam? -Hey, Sie hübscher Trottel. Wenn ich ihn erschieße, sterben auch Sie.

translation.en: [Louis] Adam?
I'm thinking it over.
-What? What do you mean you're thinking? -Yeah.
translation.de: -Was? Was meinst du damit? -Ja. Das ist kompliziert.

translation.en: -It's a complicated issue. -What is there to think over?
translation.de: -Was? Was meinst du damit? -Ja. Das ist kompliziert. -Was ist so schwierig? -Die Entscheidung!

translation.en: -It's a big decision! -No, it's not!
-It's not. -I need to think it through!
I'm about to lose my shit here!
-Give her the drive! -Give her the drive, man!
-Give her the drive! -[Maya] Please!
[computer] Electromagnetic seal compromised.
[computer] Commencing emergency protocols.
[soldier] Come here.
[grunts] Hey! Let me go! [Louis] Adam, just hang on!
-[young Adam] Let me go! -Get me that drive! Now!
[computer] Access denied.
[young Adam] Get off me! Dad!
This way!
♪ I don't want no more ♪
Yeah.
-Get the drive! -The drive!
[whispers] Superhero landing.
Ever had your ass kicked by a 12-year-old nerd with an inhaler?
translation.de: Schon mal von einem 12-jährigen Nerd mit Asthmaspray vermöbelt worden?

translation.en: -Suppertime, Spanky. -No.
-[yelps] -No!
Finish him!
-[Christos] Come on! -[choking]
-[Sorian] Christos! -No!
[computer] Core breached.
Reactor stability compromised.
Commence evacuation.
Lockdown in two minutes.
Buddy, it's time to go. Come on.
I can't shut it down!
[Maya] Stop!
I want my drive.
You can't have it.
Shoot him now.
Get behind me, both of you.
Look, Dad, Dad, those guns shoot armor-piercing bullets. So even behind you, we're still Swiss cheese.
translation.de: Das sind panzerbrechende Waffen. Selbst hinter dir sind wir Schweizer Käse.

translation.en: -Thanks for that information. -You're welcome.
-Maybe spread out a little. -Maybe a good idea.
[Louis] Maya, you're not a murderer.
Not yet, anyway.
[Sorian] Listen to me.
Everything we've worked for,
it goes away unless you pull this trigger.
Okay, come on.
[computer] One minute 30 seconds until lockdown.
translation.de: Eine Minute und 30 Sekunden bis zum Lockdown.

translation.en: [Sorian] You can do it.
Do it!
Maya, you're better than this.
translation.de: Maya, du bist besser als das.

translation.en: Sorry, Louis, but you brought this on yourself.
translation.de: Sorry, aber daran bist du selbst schuld.

translation.en: Maybe so.
You think I'm playing?
Ask your son how I play.
I had to kill his wife twice to protect the integrity of my program.
translation.de: Ich musste seine Frau zweimal töten, um mein Programm zu schützen.

translation.en: Now, don't think I won't put a bullet right through you.
translation.de: Glaub nicht, dass ich dir keine Kugel reinjagen werde.

translation.en: Give it to me!
No.
[computer] One minute until lockdown.
You just never understood the bigger picture. [chuckles sadly]
translation.de: Du hast das große Ganze nie verstanden.

translation.en: And you never understood the science.
How did you know that would work?
translation.de: Woher wusstest du, dass es funktioniert?

translation.en: Those armor-piercing rounds contain a magnetic steel core.
translation.de: Diese Patronen haben einen magnetischen Stahlkern.

translation.en: Sometimes it pays to be a nerd, guys.
translation.de: Manchmal lohnt es sich, ein Nerd zu sein.

translation.en: [computer] Containment protocol initiated.
-Ten seconds remaining. -Whoa.
-Yeah, we should run. -Yep.
[computer] Nine.
Eight.
Seven.
[computer] Six.
-Five. -[Louis] Go! Four.
Three.
-[Louis yelling] Oh, shit! -[computer] Two.
One.
Well, I'd say Bring Your Kid to Work Day was a huge success.
translation.de: Der Bring-dein-Kind-mit-zur-Arbeit-Tag war doch ein voller Erfolg.

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -Yep.
-[Adam] What are you looking at? -[Louis] You're still here.
translation.de: Was ist? Ihr seid noch da.

translation.en: I figured after we eliminated time travel, you two would go back to your fixed times.
translation.de: Ich dachte, ihr verschwindet in eure Fixzeiten.

translation.en: It probably takes a while for 30 years of changed time
translation.de: Es dauert wohl etwas, bis sich 30 Jahre veränderte Zeit sortiert haben.

translation.en: to sort itself out.
translation.de: bis sich 30 Jahre veränderte Zeit sortiert haben.

translation.en: [young Adam] I don't think we have long.
translation.de: Lange haben wir wohl nicht mehr.

translation.en: I can feel somethin' happening.
[Adam] Me too.
Sure it's okay for us to be here?
translation.de: Sicher, dass das hier ok ist?

translation.en: [Louis] It's fine. Your mom takes you to science club on Thursdays.
translation.de: Ja, Mom fährt dich donnerstags zum Science Club.

translation.en: Look, um… Dad.
[sighs] There's somethin' we need to tell you. I… I already know.
translation.de: -Wir müssen dir etwas sagen. -Ich weiß es schon.

translation.en: I knew the moment I saw you.
translation.de: Ich wusste es, als ich euch sah.

translation.en: I'm sorry, boys. I'm, uh…
I'm sorry that I'm… I'm not gonna be there for you down the road,
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass ich nicht für euch da sein werde.

translation.en: and I've given it a lot of thought,
but you cannot tell me how or when it happens.
translation.de: aber ihr dürft mir nicht sagen, wie oder wann es passiert.

translation.en: You came back here
translation.de: Ihr seid hier, weil niemand die Zukunft verändern darf.

translation.en: because no one has a right to change the future, including us.
translation.de: Ihr seid hier, weil niemand die Zukunft verändern darf. -Auch wir nicht. -Deine Zukunft.

translation.en: It's your future.
No.
You're my future.
Both of you.
And how lucky am I
translation.de: Und was für ein Glück habe ich,

translation.en: that I got to see it?
I haven't been there for you.
translation.de: Ich war nicht für dich da.

translation.en: And I'm sorry.
But I saw you being born.
translation.de: Aber ich sah, wie du zur Welt kamst.

translation.en: I watched you take your first breath.
And after that happens, nothing is ever the same again.
translation.de: Und danach war nichts mehr so wie vorher.

translation.en: You're my son, Adam,
and I love you.
-You're my boy, and I love you. -Okay. You don't have to do all--
translation.de: Mein Junge, und ich liebe dich. Ok, du musst nicht…

translation.en: I loved you from the first minute that I saw you.
translation.de: Ich habe dich von Anfang an geliebt, und das wird immer so bleiben.

translation.en: -And that will never change. -I… I get that.
translation.de: Ich habe dich von Anfang an geliebt, und das wird immer so bleiben. Verstehe.

translation.en: -Adam, you're my boy. -Dad? We really don't have to do all--
-You're amazing. -[Adam] Okay.
-I love you. -I get it, Dad.
I don't think you do.
-I am proud of you. -Okay.
[Louis] I love you, son.
Know that inside your heart. Know… Come here. Come here.
translation.de: Das solltest du wissen, in deinem Herzen. Komm her.

translation.en: [Louis] You're my boys, and you'll always be my boys.
translation.de: Ihr seid meine Jungs. Und ihr werdet immer meine Jungs sein.

translation.en: Throughout all time.
-[Adam sniffles] I love you, Dad. -[Louis] I love you, buddy.
translation.de: -Ich liebe dich, Dad. -Ich dich auch, Kumpel.

translation.en: [whispers] Don't carry this around anymore.
translation.de: Trag das nicht länger mit dir herum.

translation.en: I need you, Dad.
It's so hard without you.
translation.de: Es ist so schwer ohne dich.

translation.en: I know.
You're gonna be okay.
-You're gonna be better than okay. -You don't know that.
Are you kidding me?
Have you seen this guy?
There's gotta be somethin' we can do.
translation.de: Etwas müssen wir doch tun können.

translation.en: I can think of somethin'.
[Adam] You really gonna do this?
All right.
All right. Can you do me a favor?
translation.de: Ok. Alles klar. Versprichst du mir etwas?

translation.en: I don't know if we're gonna remember any of this,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob wir uns erinnern werden,

translation.en: but maybe there'll be an echo or somethin', like Laura said.
translation.de: aber vielleicht gibt es ja so ein Echo wie Laura sagte.

translation.en: But just in case,
give Mom a hug for me. Would you do that?
translation.de: Nimm Mom für mich in den Arm. Würdest du das tun?

translation.en: Not one of your lame-ass side hugs either.
translation.de: Und zwar nicht nur so lahm von der Seite.

translation.en: I'm talkin' the break-a-rib kinda hug. Yeah?
Yeah.
Holy shit.
What?
I spent 30 years trying to get away from the me that was you.
translation.de: Ich habe 30 Jahre versucht, vor meinem Ich, das du warst, wegzulaufen.

translation.en: And I'll tell you what, kid.
I hate to say it, but you were the best part all along.
translation.de: Ich sage das nur ungern, aber du warst der beste Teil.

translation.en: -Are we gonna smoke this banana or sit-- -Play ball!
translation.de: -Packen wir den Lümmel bei den Eiern oder… -Spielt!

translation.en: Hey there.
Aren't you late for work?
Yeah. I need to pay the insurance on the house.
It's in the calendar, but I can't find the statement.
translation.de: Ich hab's im Kalender, finde aber den Nachweis nicht.

translation.en: With that filing system? Shocking.
-Shocking. -[Adam] It should all be online.
[Ellie] This is how Dad did it.

translation.en: -Grab a pile, would you? -I'll be late for school.

translation.en: Oh my gosh. You're right. Okay. Have a great day, honey.

translation.en: [Adam] Yeah?
Just making sure I wasn't getting mugged.

translation.en: Maybe you are.
Get over here! Get over here!
I love you, honey.
Love you too.
[man] So, as I said earlier,
our goal is to calculate the variability of gravitational force,

translation.en: which depends entirely on whether your path of motion
translation.de: welche ganz davon abhängt, ob Sie sich

translation.de: auf die Erde zu oder von ihr weg bewegen.

translation.de: Definieren wir die Erdanziehungskraft also an einem Objekt

translation.en: by Newton's gravitational formula.
F is equal to big G, Newton's gravitational constant,
translation.de: F ist gleich G, wobei G die Gravitationskonstante ist.

He's been talking for 15 minutes. Managed to put the entire class to sleep.

translation.en: You look awake. No. No, no, no, no, no.
I've trained myself to… to fall fast asleep but keep my eyes open.

-Are you serious? -[snoring]
-Cool, right? -Yeah. -Yeah. -Super cool. [chuckles]

-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you too.
-I'll, um… I'll be quiet. -Okay.
-Where do they find these guest lecturers? -[snickering]
Right?
It's like they're genetically engineered to bore us to death.

-Yes, I am. Yeah. -Shit.
What's your field?
Um… computational linguistics.
-No way! -Yeah.
-I don't know what that is. Um… -Oh.

translation.en: -Oh. -Yeah.
Oh. You're in the wrong place, I think.

-No. -Yeah.
[Laura] I don't think that…
-I knew it. -Okay. All right.

Actually, you're in the wrong campus.
Then I'm lost.

Are you sure? I mean, I would hate to disturb your sleep.

I've got time.
